request.description: Create or update generic business partner. Updates instead of creating a new business partner if an already existing external ID is used. The same external ID may not occur more than once in a single request. For a single request, the maximum number of business partners in the request is limited to 100 entries.

request.description: The business partners to set the ready state for are identified by their external-id. Only business partners in an initial or error state can be set to ready. If any given business partner could not be set into ready state for any reason (for example, it has not been found or it is in the wrong state) the whole request fails (all or nothing approach).

request.description: Find paginated list of business partner relations from the input stage. There are various filter criteria available. All filters are 'AND' filters.

response.name: A paginated list of business partner relations for the input stage

query.description: If true a business partner relation will be created even if a relation could not be found under the given external identifier.

request.description: Update an existing business partner relation on the input stage. By using a request parameter it is also possible to create a relation if the relation with the given external identifier does not exist.

response.name: The given business partner relation has been updated.
On wrong or insufficient user provided data like references to non-existent business partners or relations that violate the relation constraints.

request.description: Create a new relation between two business partner entries on the input stage. The external identifier is optional and a new one will be automatically created if not given. A given external identifier has to be unique.

response.name: The created business partner input relation
If the business partner could not be created based on wrong or insufficient data provided such as non-existent business partners or violated relation constraints.
If a relation with the given external identifier already exists

query.description: (Required) The external identifier of the business partner relation to delete

request.description: Delete a relation between two business partners on the input stage.

response.name: The specified relation has been deleted.
On specifying a relation that does not exist.
